pages.text: First, place down your jam pot. Then follow the recipe below: $(br) $(li) Add some water and sugar to the pot by right clicking on it with a water bucket and sugar $(li) Add your ingredients! You can add up to 4 different types of food to your jam. Right click on the pot with your food and the jam will slowly change colour as it brews.

pages.title: Congratulations
pages.text: Once you're finished with your mixing, Shift + Right Click on the pot with your jam jar to extract it. $(br2) You've now made (and hopefully eaten - without dying) your first jar of jam! Next, try experimenting with different ingredients and effects! Good luck!
